title: wish...
content: having a hard day... been ages since I've had one this bad...  a few things have happened over the last week which have made me wish my beloved was here with me... he was always my biggest supporter...  never know when the grief will overwhelm you, sigh...    spotted these yesterday... he loved alliums...

feed.name: herbiggirlpants
feed.description: the new reality of a "60 something"
